body: We are considering the feature of switching all legend elements on and off. But not with double-click perhaps, since this is not a natural interaction way for users to think of.
`finished` is called without Vue environment. Please check again with Vue usage.
Axis label for radar is currently not supported. See #9282 for further information.
It doesn't seem so from the doc. Have @pissang for a double check.
This is due to the implementation of the comet-tail effect. Because it needs to blend with previous frames, it is not possible to remain the previous result when set new data.
Please add an example at jsfiddle.net to reproduce this.
Sure, thanks! @pissang will review the code later.

So let me be clear.
What you want from ECharts is:
(1) Not to show item (the green triangle and the purple rectangle) of other series
(2) Not to show information of other series in tooltip

You may try with [tooltip.trigger to be `'item'`](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#tooltip.trigger) and [axisPointer](http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#axisPointer) to be shown. See doc for more detials.
By now, you have to use different series name, and then listen to legend events and trigger legend action.

@YuanYifei I'll have a lot at it. Thanks.

Please see https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/tree/master/src/util . The document should be improved.

About performance, you may refer http://echarts.baidu.com/examples/editor.html?c=graphgl-npm-dep&gl=1&theme=dark . This example has 10000+ nodes and 27000 edges, so 1000 data shouldn't be too slow.

As other features, you are very welcomed to make pull requests to support those. :)

I do not know how echarts handle the series data inside, actually the data I passed to series is a 2 columns, n rows data array, So I use dimension 1 as Y axis value as well as visualMap. It appears to me echarts copied the column for visualMap in this special case, this is not reasonable since users do not know the behavior of copying of a column after the original data is passed to echarts option. So I cannot define the correct dimension for visualMap in this special case. The behavior should be consistent with common case. (visualMap and y axis uses different column).

You just need to set add `startAngle: 60` (as in 360/6 data points) to your `radius: {}` options, next to the `indicator` array.

谢谢，我已经找到问题，是在计算坐标时，y的值为NaN。从一开始我就找错了方向，因为坐标是随机计算的。并没有想到会是y值坐标出错。他们提示off没有定义。就直接进到错误代码行查找，最终没有结果。现在已经好了。
Thank you. I have found the problem. When calculating coordinates, the value of Y is NaN.　
[a.zip](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/files/2591715/a.zip)

From the beginning, I found the wrong direction because the coordinates were random. I didn't expect it to be an error in the y value coordinate. They suggested that off was not defined. It goes straight to the wrong code line and finds no result. It's all right now.

但是，双击事件仍然无响应，代码见附件
[a.zip](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/files/2591719/a.zip)
。
However, the double click event is still unresponsive, and the code is attached.

事件代码写法如下：
The event code is written as follows:
```
		g_myChart.on('dblclick', function (params) {
			console.log('dblclick');
		});
```
